about_the_game:
Music plays an important role in setting the somber mood of This War of Mine. Created by the unfailingly excellent Piotr Musiał and one of the studio programmer Grzegorz Mazur, it will remind you of the most memorable moments of the story you experienced in this remarkable game. It's provided in three formats for your convenience (flac, mp3 and wav). The final OST contains a total of 16 tracks.

Complete track list:

  • This War of Mine
  • Some Place We Called Home
  • When The Night Comes
  • These Cold Days
  • No Good Choice
  • We Keep Going
  • Things Right and Wrong
  • Monday Cigarette
  • Time Is Running Out
  • The Last Goodbye
  • Thaw
  • Tuned To Live
  • Alone
  • Still Alive Inside
  • A girl from Pogoren
  • Never Forget
